index.title: Documentation Overview
index.description: How to read and use this documentation

architecture.title: Architecture Overview
architecture.intro: The basic building blocks of Angular applications

displaying-data.title: Displaying Data
displaying-data.intro: Property binding helps show app data in the UI.

user-input.title: User Input
user-input.intro: User input triggers DOM events. We listen to those events with event bindings that funnel updated values back into our components and models.

forms.title: Forms
forms.intro: A form creates a cohesive, effective, and compelling data entry experience. An Angular form coordinates a set of data-bound user controls, tracks changes, validates input, and presents errors.

dependency-injection.title: Dependency Injection
dependency-injection.intro: Angular's dependency injection system creates and delivers dependent services "just-in-time".

template-syntax.title: Template Syntax
template-syntax.intro: Learn how to write templates that display data and consume user events with the help of data binding.

cheatsheet.title: Angular Cheat Sheet
cheatsheet.intro: A quick guide to Angular syntax. (Content is provisional and may change.)

glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.intro: Brief definitions of the most important words in the Angular vocabulary

change-log.title: Change Log
change-log.intro: An annotated history of recent documentation improvements.

animations.title: Animations
animations.intro: A guide to Angular's animation system.

attribute-directives.title: Attribute Directives
attribute-directives.intro: Attribute directives attach behavior to elements.

component-styles.title: Component Styles
component-styles.intro: Learn how to apply CSS styles to components.

hierarchical-dependency-injection.title: Hierarchical Dependency Injectors
hierarchical-dependency-injection.intro: Angular's hierarchical dependency injection system supports nested injectors in parallel with the component tree.

server-communication.title: HTTP Client
server-communication.intro: Use an HTTP Client to talk to a remote server.

lifecycle-hooks.title: Lifecycle Hooks
lifecycle-hooks.intro: Angular calls lifecycle hook methods on directives and components as it creates, changes, and destroys them.

npm-packages.title: Npm Packages
npm-packages.intro: Recommended npm packages, and how to specify package dependencies

pipes.title: Pipes
pipes.intro: Pipes transform displayed values within a template.

router.title: Routing & Navigation
router.intro: Discover the basics of screen navigation with the Angular Router.

security.title: Security
security.intro: Developing for content security in Angular applications

structural-directives.title: Structural Directives
structural-directives.intro: Angular has a powerful template engine that lets us easily manipulate the DOM structure of our elements.

testing.title: Testing
testing.intro: Techniques and practices for testing an Angular app

upgrade.title: Upgrading from 1.x
upgrade.intro: Incrementally upgrade an Angular 1 application to Angular 2.

webpack.title: Webpack: an introduction
webpack.intro: Create Angular applications with a Webpack based tooling
